description: The Walking Dead is arguably one of the most famous zombie IPs (or indeed any IP) of the last 20 years, conceived by the writer who brought us Invincible and many other beloved comics, Robert Kirkman. It was a story like no other – running for 19 years – with Kirkman holding the choice to […]
title: Walker Wednesday: Introduction to The World of The Walking Dead

description: You meet all kinds of folk in the Wild West of Thunder Junction, including characters from the best anime of all time, Cowboy Bebop. In a new crossover collaboration with the legendary anime, Wizards of the Coast is releasing a series of promotional variant cards that depict characters from Outlaws of Thunder Junction in a […]
title: Magic: The Gathering Reveals New Cowboy Bebop Collaboration

description: I’ve seen comics artist Don Rosa a number of times over the years at Atlanta’s Dragon Con and it always tickles me to see the big hand-written sign that says “THIS IS NOT DUCK TALES” when clearly the pictures of Uncle Scrooge, Donald Duck and of course Huey, Dewey, and Louie suggest otherwise. Mr. Rosa’s […]
title: Mikey Mouse Club #17: Budget Deck 2- Duckburg!

description: Hey everyone! The UTC has been reasonably quiet up til this weekend where we had a slew of Killteam events. Which means we’re back with our first stats wrap up since the balance data slate. We’ve seen the decline of the Kommandos, and the rise of the Heirotek circle in the meantime. Melee hordes have […]
title: Killteam UTC Weekend Recap and Preview: Apr 16- Apr 22, 2024

description: This may be the biggest Competitive Innovations in the Mortal Realms ever. A total of Seven large events, all over the world and a huge variety of lists to pore over. No use delaying, let’s go! As a note, the “Best of the Rest” will be trimmed to a top 8 for this week due to […]
title: Competitive Innovations in the Mortal Realms: Around the World

description: The metagame is (presumably) on borrowed time, and this week it’s the Astra Militarum’s turn to take a big swing at the Necron menace, with a reasonable degree of success. The Thousand Sons and Sororitas are getting in on the action too, and as a result the robot dominance isn’t quite as extreme as it […]
title: Competitive Innovations in 10th: Good Guard pt.1

description: And then there were four. Welcome back to our Best Year in Gaming March Madness bracket competition! If you’re just joining us, we’ve been slowly working our way through the past 50 years of games, voting on head-to-head matchups between each year, deciding which was the best year in gaming based on the games released […]
title: The Best Year in Gaming: The Final Four
